00011 
00012 The Nitrox SDK provides a development environment for writing applications
00013 for Nitrox. 
00014 
00015 The SDK consists of:
00016     - Nitrox driver sources
00017     - Microcode binaries for different family of Nitrox Processors
00018     - Power On Test Suite (POTS) Utilities 
00019     - Speed Test benchmarking tool
